name: Deco Neko - Cat Room Design
description:
We are a small team of 2. Our passion is to create cute and relaxing feel-good games for everybody to enjoy. We create all our art and music along with writing code.

We appreciate you for supporting us and sharing Deco Neko with your friends and loved ones!

If you wish to contact us, please email us directly at support@flyingbunnystudios.ca
